snippet.title: Asterix & Obelix: Heroes - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
Your favorite Gauls are back for a brand new adventure! Choose the cards of your fighters from the comic book heroes, use them to hit the Romans, and progress in the adventure. With this turn-based card game, fighting Caesar has never been so much fun!

Asterix & Obelix: Heroes will be available on PS5 on October 5, 2023.

#ps5 #ps5games
